thread.title: Northwest Illinois Sports Hall of Fame induction banquet to be held
thread.title_full: Northwest Illinois Sports Hall of Fame induction banquet to be held

title: Northwest Illinois Sports Hall of Fame induction banquet to be held
text: Northwest Illinois Sports Hall of Fame induction banquet to be held Comment Posted Oct. 6, 2015 at 9:00 AM Posted Oct. 6, 2015 at 9:00 AM SAVANNA — The 2015 induction banquet into the Northwest Illinois Sports Hall of Fame will be held at 5:45 p.m. Oct. 17 at Manny’s Pizza, 211 Main St. The event will begin with a social period. Dinner will be held at 6:30 p.m., and a program will be held afterward. A limited number of tickets are available. Cost: $20, ticket. To purchase tickets or for information: 815-273-7757 or brian@wcciradio.com. Journal Standard
